title.narrative: F.a: Supporting women's groups in Bozum

description.narrative: 1. Project: 11933 Strengthening Womens Livelihoods in Central African Republic (CAR)#2. Project area and Country: Bozoum, prefecture of Ouham Pende, Central African Republic (CAR)#3. Project justification:#80% of the population in CAR gained their liveliho ods from agriculture before the escalation of the crisis in 2013. Due to the volatile security context, displacement and loss of means of production, people are not in a position to implement their livelihood related activities, while half of the populatio n in CAR is in need of humanitarian assistance. In Bozoum, only 20% of women are estimated to be literate and the government support to economic and agricultural activities is weak. In the prevailing humanitarian context, young men, as potential members of armed groups, are often prioritized for livelihood activities.#4. The main objective and expected results:#The project will build on the lessons learnt from the previous livelihood projects in Ombella MPoko and Bozoum areas. The projects main objective is multi sectorial empowerment of 500 targeted women in the Bozoum area. This will be accomplished through creating opportunities and conditions for enhanced livelihoods, as well as improving the womens literacy skills and establishing womens savings groups, a new initiative in the country. The project will also facilitate the creation of small-scale business initiatives, and support the womens conflict mediation skills. The key activities include adult literacy training, business management training, saving and credit scheme management training, support to the establishment of womens conflict mediation committees and facilitating access to financial assistance to establish businesses/income generation activities.#5. Right-holders/ beneficiaries: 500 women fro m 15 different womens organizations and groups. Indirect beneficiaries apx. 4500 family members.#Duty-bearers: FCA seeks collaboration with the local duty bearers in order to ensure the sustainability of the economic initiatives and adult literacy educatio n#6. Implementing partner: This project is self-implemented by FCA CAR.
